definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
to meet by chance (usually with misfortune)/classifier for events: time, turn, incident

sentences.english: His need to implement positive change in the world around him keeps him awake at nights.
sentences.chinese: 夜深了，改良周遭世界的願望使他夜不能眠。

sentences.english: Those vibrations result in the compression and rarefaction of the surrounding air.
sentences.chinese: 這些振動會導致周遭空氣被壓縮及稀少。

sentences.english: Stopping his horses again, Nikolay looked round him.
sentences.chinese: 尼古拉又勒住馬，向周遭望了一眼。

sentences.english: My pussy ass muscles contracting around his cock and my JJ shouting.
sentences.chinese: 我的貓驢肌肉在他的公雞和我的JJ大叫周遭收縮。

sentences.english: The height of the Empire State Building belittles the houses around it.
sentences.chinese: 帝國大廈的高度使它周遭的房屋顯得渺小。

sentences.english: So for example, I have perceptions of the world around me.
sentences.chinese: 舉個例子來說，對於周遭的事物，我擁有一定的感知。

sentences.english: When chanting it, the supreme energy manifests everywhere around us.
sentences.chinese: 當唱誦時，這至高無上的能量會在我們周遭各處顯現。

sentences.english: Christians need more than ever to show this side of Christ's heart of love.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒需要更多流露基督的愛心，去關顧周遭的人。

sentences.english: All about us is noise and bramble.
sentences.chinese: 我們的周遭都是荊棘與嘈雜聲浪。

sentences.english: Around me I hear that eclat of the world, politics, produce.
sentences.chinese: 我聽到了周遭世界稱譽，有政治，生育。

sentences.english: And he holds the key to the corruption Orin sees all around him.
sentences.chinese: 他是破解奧瑞目睹的周遭腐敗的關鍵。

sentences.english: However frenetic our environment, such a feeling of existence can be achieved.
sentences.chinese: 不管周遭如何狂熱，我們都可以獲得這種存在感。

sentences.english: Blind anole still has the ability to change color to adapt to surrounding environment.
sentences.chinese: 瞎眼的變色龍，還是有能力變色來適應周遭環境的。

sentences.english: I can help myself by helping those around me.
sentences.chinese: 我可以通過幫助我周遭的一切來幫助我自己。

sentences.english: If variable v, surrounding environment is quiet.
sentences.chinese: 心若是調伏了，周遭的環境自會隨之安靜。
周遭變得愈加以消費爲導向。

definition: in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
